Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Besides being a normal formatter, a display formatter is used to render contents in lists using the <cms:display> tag. The tag uses the formatter marked as display formatter to render a content, moreover specific such formatters (if more than one is present for a content type) can be provided to the tag. To select them, the special "DisplayTypeSelectWidget" is available. Read about lists since OpenCms 11 to get a good impression on display formatters.
